## Mingyu Jeon (전민규)

I am a PhD student advised by [Yong-Jae Moon](https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Yong-Jae-Moon) in the [Sun and Space Weather Laboratory](https://sunspaceweather.khu.ac.kr/) at Kyung Hee University. My research interests are in **solar physics** and **machine learning**.
